array.name: cardtext
array.item: Take our Mental Health Self Assessment Test to know about your mental health. Answer all the questions honestly.
A good article is like a wholesome healthy meal for your brain and mental well-being. So check out some latest news and feed your brain.
Watch some wholesome memes and share them with your family and friends.
Journaling helps control your symptoms and improve your mood by helping you prioritize problems, fears and concerns. Write your emotion journal now.
Writing things down helps reduce stress and feel more relaxed. You get a feeling of being in control of your life and actions. Create a to do list now.
View your previous Mental Health Test scores and their statistics and draw conclusions from them.
